name: Yasso 800s
details: Run 800 meters at your target marathon pace per mile (e.g. 3:00 if targeting 3-hour marathon). Recover for 90 seconds standing.
suggested_pace: Aiming for a 2:45 marathon: run each rep in 2 mins and 45 secs.

name: 10 x 1km
details: Maintain consistent 5K effort. Focus on pacing and form. Ideal on track or flat road loop.

name: 3 x 5K
details: Start at tempo pace, then increase by 10–15s/km per rep. Use treadmill incline (0.5–1%) to simulate real running.
suggested_pace: Start at Half-marathon pace; progress to 5k pace.

name: 8 x Mile Repeats
details: Run each mile at threshold pace (~15K pace or effort). 60–90 sec jog or standing rest. Use HR monitor if available.

name: 20 x 400m
details: Run 400m fast but relaxed (~3K pace), with equal jog rest. Focus on quick cadence and smooth form.

name: 5 x 2km
details: Run each 2km at ~10K effort. 2-3 min jog recovery. Focus on control and consistent pacing.

name: Fartlek: 2-1
details: Run 2 minutes hard (~10K effort), followed by 1 minute easy jog. Repeat 10 times. Good for trails or rolling terrain.
suggested_pace: Between Mile and 5k pace on fast sections.

name: Hill Repeats: 10 x 60s
details: Run for 60 seconds up a hill with 8-13% incline. Walk down and immediately start again.

name: 6 Mile Tempo Run
details: Run 6 miles at your threshold pace (comfortably hard). Use a flat course or treadmill. Focus on rhythm, posture, and breathing.
suggested_pace: Half-marathon pace, give or take a few seconds.
